text: was a Japanese politician. he was Prime Minister of Japan from 1978 to 1980. Ōhira's time in office was cut short when he died in office of a heart attack.Stokes, Henry Scott. "Japan's Prime Minister Ōhira Dies At 70 as a Critical Election Nears; Japan's Prime Minister Dies at 70 After Heart Attack Plans for Venice Meeting", The New York Times. 12 June 1980. ==References== Category:1910 births Category:1980 deaths Category:People from Kagawa Prefecture Category:Prime ministers of Japan Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Foreign ministers of Japan Category:Chief Cabinet Secretaries of Japan Category:Ministers of finance of Japan
title: Masayoshi Ōhira
